name: df-xmet
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cxmet, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), nat0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wral(s4, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cle, co(co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cxad, co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3)))))))))))
comment: Define the set of all extended metrics on a given base set. The definition is similar to ~ df-met , but we also allow the metric to take on the value ` +oo ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
